rows.label: tlk41310141_01_msg0001
rows.name:
When you're taking on a request, first
and foremost, you've got to consider
the needs of the client.

rows.label: tlk41310141_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Especially when the livelihood of us
mercs are dependent on the rewards
they give us.

rows.label: tlk41310141_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Any time we scoff at or make fun of
our employers, well, that'll come back
to bite us in the behind sooner or later.

rows.label: tlk41310141_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Now, it may be no skin off your back,
but you'd do well to remember that.
It can't hurt playing it safe, you hear?
